_header: Gracious and gay on her light all my thought
_description: A description of his fair mistress — five cross-rhymed quatrains

DublinNatLib1435.First Lines:
Gracius and gay / on hyr lyytt all my troȝthButt sche rew on
                    me to day / to deth sche hatt me broth…
DublinNatLib1435.Last Lines: …Kysse me yn my wayOnys are y wen[d]
DublinNatLib1435.Note: Opening quatrain written as two lines.
